timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    <firstVersion>1.0.0-CR4</firstVersion>
          
          
            
                    <firstVersion>1.1.0</firstVersion>
          
      
    
    
  

You probably generated the modules before 1.0.0. If you did it now, you'd get the currently correct firstVersion 1.1.0
After changing this, please rebase (the structure of the docs changed a bit) and run mvn process-resources -Pformat
timeline.author: ppalaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,94 @@

+<project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+         xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
+         xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd">
+    <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+    <parent>
+        <groupId>org.apache.camel.quarkus</groupId>
+        <artifactId>camel-quarkus-arangodb-parent</artifactId>
+        <version>1.1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+        <relativePath>../pom.xml</relativePath>
+    </parent>
+
+    <artifactId>camel-quarkus-arangodb</artifactId>
+    <name>Camel Quarkus :: ArangoDb :: Runtime</name>
+    <description>Perform operations on ArangoDb documents, collections and graphs.</description>
+
+    <properties>
+        <firstVersion>1.0.0-CR4</firstVersion>

replies.bodyText:
rebase (the structure of the docs changed a bit)

Sorry, I was wrong about this, I have not noticed that this PR was against camel-master. camel-master is yet to be reabased on top of master to get those changes. I'd say let's merge this and let the camel-master maintainer deal with the rebase conflicts.
replies.author: ppalaga
